Detailed Description

template<class IdTraits, class Ptr = typename IdTraits::base_type *>
struct TREX::utils::pointer_id_traits< IdTraits, Ptr >

Identifier extraction for pointer based element.

Template Parameters:
IdTraits An idenitifer extraction traits for the first element
Ptr A pointer like type

A traits used to generate a list_set containing pointer / smart pointer elements

Author:
Frderic Py <fpy@mbari.org>
